content: jomo socks by twinset & purl jomo socks by twinset & purl there are lots of mojo socks on ravelry and this pattern is the perfect sock to get your knitting mojo back i also wanted to call these the mojo socks because of two very special people in my life my twin sister jo my best friend and partner in twinset & purl and my lovely mum whose name was mo but who is no longer with us therefore to make them a little bit different these are the jomo socks pattern information sizes 1 adult m 64 sts / 2 adult l 72 sts to fit approximately 8-inch 20 cm /9-inch 22 5 cm foot circumference yarn the dotty wool co high twist sw merino sock 80% sw merino wool/20% nylon 100g/365m 399yds in the sunset colour way needles 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or size needed to get gauge gauge 8 sts & 12 rounds = 1 inch / 2 5 cm in stocking stitch notions stitch markers and cable needle notes i knit my socks on 9-inch circular needles but if you would like to knit them using magic loop the stitches should be distributed as follows needle 1 32 36 sts / needle 2 32 36 sts where the instructions differ between sizes those for the larger size will be in brackets we would love to see your jomo socks abbreviations bor beginning of round please tag us on instagram @twinsetandpurl c8b place 4 sts on cable needle and hold to and use #jomosocks the back p1 k2 p1 then p1 k2 p1 from cable needle happy knitting c8f place 4 sts on cable needle and hold to the front p1 k2 p1 then p1 k2 p1 twinset & purl from cable needle cc contrast colour k knit ktbl knit one st through the back loop k2tog knit two stitches together m marker mc main colour p purl pm place marker p2tog purl two stitches together rm remove marker round s round s rs right side sl slip_stitch with yarn in back sm slip marker ssk slip 1 st knitwise slip 1 st knitwise knit two sts together through the back loop st s stitch es ws wrong side 1 @twinsetandpurl ©rachel fletcher 2022 #jomosocks instructions row 3 sl1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn cast on 64 72 sts using a german twisted cast on repeat row 3 & 4 until all stitches have been worked pm and join for knitting in the round making sure not to and 20 22 heel sts remain twist the sts cuff gusset right sock note if you are using magic loop you should maintain round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end the instep sts on one needle and the sole sts on the other repeat round 1 30 times in total needle additionally you will only need to place a
